scripts.load-test:check: command -v k6 >/dev/null 2>&1 || { echo 'Error: k6 is not installed. Install with: brew install k6'; exit 1; }
scripts.load-test:baseline: npm run load-test:check && npm run load-test:setup && k6 run --env API_KEY=$API_KEY tests/load/baseline.js
scripts.load-test:moderate: npm run load-test:check && npm run load-test:setup && k6 run --env API_KEY=$API_KEY tests/load/moderate.js
scripts.load-test:high: npm run load-test:check && npm run load-test:setup && k6 run --env API_KEY=$API_KEY tests/load/high-load.js
scripts.load-test:spike: npm run load-test:check && npm run load-test:setup && k6 run --env API_KEY=$API_KEY tests/load/spike.js
scripts.load-test:all: npm run load-test:baseline && npm run load-test:moderate && npm run load-test:high && npm run load-test:spike
